text: TAUCETI Unknown Origin is an upcoming video game developed and published by BadFly Interactive. The game is set in the same universe as Dead Effect and Dead Effect 2. ==Development== The game was announced on 7 August 2017 when BadFly Interactive released first teaser. ==Plot== Story is set after Dead Effect 2. ESS Meridian crashes on planet Tau Ceti F. Player wakes up in a jungle and has to survive harsh environment of the planet. == References == == External links == * Category:Upcoming video games Category:First-person shooters Category:Science fiction video games Category:Video games developed in the Czech Republic Category:Unreal Engine games Category:Windows games Category:MacOS games Category:Single-player video games Category:Xbox One games Category:PlayStation 4 games
title: TAUCETI Unknown Origin
